string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: Set your Timetable, Schedule your day and make it handy.
Detailed Information about the Courses Offered by each School
Get to know the Lecturers in each School and their Research Areas
Have Knowledge of the Holidays, and the Schedules of the School as well as the academic calendar for the year
Get to know all the Officials in the International Office and their positions and who to contact in case of necessity
Get to know your ISU Officials, their contacts as well as other information about you and your academics
Get Your Academic resources from here
See the Beauty of the campus and the events recorded
